dict.acceptation: 追捕；打猎；猎物（指鸟兽等）；槽；
追逐，追赶；追寻；追求（常与after连用）；[口语] 奔跑；

sent.orig: Chase dismisses him and even Cameron is impressed.
sent.trans: 他们进行了各种测试，House指责了Chase帮Amber做测试。

sent.orig: Chase shows Krista the signs they use to indicate safe locations.
sent.trans: Chase告诉krista哪些记号代表安全地带。

sent.orig: And a low-complexity erased Chase algorithm is developed.
sent.trans: 提出了一种带删除的Chase算法，在译码性能和复杂度之间取得了比较好的折衷。

sent.orig: An algorithm for soft-decision decoding (15, 11) RS is presented, which refers to the Chase algorithm.
sent.trans: 本文利用Chase算法的思想，将软判决译码应用到RS(15，11)码上，降低了译码的复杂度。

sent.orig: If Pooh were here, he must chase these leaves. Let me chase them too.
sent.trans: 如果维尼在这里，他肯定会追这些树叶，让我也来追树叶吧。
